Assessment.QuestionText: Can you match the properties and methods of the <font face="courier new">Control</font> class against their corresponding descriptions?

Options.Option: This property retrieves a collection of controls in the specified control.
This property specifies or retrieves the parent container associated with control.
This property checks whether the control responds to user interaction.
This method sends a paint message to the control.
This method triggers the <font face="courier new">Paint</font> event.

Assessment.CorrectFeedback: Yes, that's correct! You get one point for your response.
Assessment.incorrectFeedback: No, that's incorrect. The correct combinations are: (A)-(5), (B)-(4), (C)-(1), (D)-(3), and (E)-(2).
